For optimal performance, set the duration based on your activity intensity:
 - 2 seconds for high-intensity, real-time monitoring.
 - 3 seconds for moderate-intensity or general use.
 - 5 seconds for resting heart rate or low-intensity measurements.

For accurate heart rate measurement:
 - Measure the pulse for 15 seconds and multiply by 4 to get the beats per minute (bpm).
 - Alternatively, measure for 30 seconds and multiply by 2.
 - For higher accuracy or irregular pulses, measure for a full 60 seconds.

- For a healthy heart, we recommend walking at least 10,000 steps per day or engaging in 30-60 minutes of brisk walking daily. \n- Aim for a moderate intensity where you can talk but not sing comfortably. For additional benefits, include uphill or power walking.\n- Consistency is keyâ€”walk most days of the week to strengthen your heart and improve overall cardiovascular health.
